sentences.en: Basil’s dulcet tones could be heard in the corridor.
sentences.cn: 巴兹尔那 “悦耳” 的嗓音在走廊里都听得见。

sentences.en: I thought I recognized your dulcet tones , ie the sound of your voice.
sentences.cn: 我想我听出了你那美妙的嗓音.

sentences.en: Our abroad and domestic customers'are satisfied for feature, excellent quality , superexcellent handle, dulcet timber characteristic.
sentences.cn: 产品以完美的外形,精良的做工, 绝佳的手感, 悦耳的音色等特点更加符合国内外客户的不同要求!

sentences.en: Quickly, in her dulcet voice, Tamara told him what had happened.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉用她美妙悦耳的声音快速向他讲述了所发生的一切。

sentences.en: We heard the dulcet tones of the sergeant, bawling at us to get on parade.
sentences.cn: 我们听到中士用“悦耳”的声音向我们大喊,让我们跟上队伍.

sentences.en: You hear his dulcet tones on the Radio 1 trailers in the morning.
sentences.cn: 你在早晨广播一台的新片预告节目中就能听到他悦耳的声音。
